headline: Sandisk (SNDK) Is Up 9.6% After AI-Fueled NAND Shortage Tightens SSD Supply - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In recent months, Sandisk has ridden an unprecedented shortage of NAND flash memory as AI and hyperscale data centers rapidly absorb available supply, allowing the company to raise prices on key enterprise SSD products while tightening its focus as a pure‑play flash specialist after the 2025 spin-off from Western Digital. What stands out is how AI infrastructure buildout has turned storage, rather than compute, into a critical bottleneck, putting Sandisk’s advanced BiCS8 technology and deep...
